goal_descEN: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
target_descEN: Implement the 10-Year Framework of Programmes on Sustainable Consumption and Production Patterns, all countries taking action, with developed countries taking the lead, taking into account the development and capabilities of developing countries
indicator_descEN: Number of countries developing, adopting or implementing policy instruments aimed at supporting the shift to sustainable consumption and production
seriesDescription: Country with Other implementing activities for sustainable consumption and production (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
